alerts.noticeAlreadyConnected.title: Already Connected to Database
alerts.noticeAlreadyConnected.descriptio: You are currently connected to a database. If you want to access another database, you may execute {command} to disconnect from the current database first.
alerts.errorPlayLoadFail.title: Failed to Load Play Target
alerts.ErrorNoDatabaseConnected.title: No Database Connected
alerts.ErrorNoDatabaseConnected.descript: You are not connected to any database. Use {command} to connect and start running queries.
alerts.noticeServerDisconnected.title: Database Disconnected
alerts.noticeServerDisconnected.descript: Database is Disconnected. You may use {command} to establish connection. There's a graph waiting for you.
alerts.noticeServerConnected.title: Database Connected
alerts.noticeServerConnected.description: Successfully database is connected. You may use {command} to confirm connected database information.
alerts.errorServerConnectFail.title: Database Connection Failed
alerts.errorServerConnectFail.descriptio: Failed to connect to the database. Are you sure the database is running on the server?
